events.content: Purchase order submitted by Sarah Chen - Springfield Mega Mall Construction Project. Need 12 precast concrete footers, spec F-2400x800x600mm. Order ref: #234123. Budget approved by Frank in accounting. Rush delivery requested for Phase 2 foundation work.

RE: PO 234123 - Quote Confirmation

Hi Sarah,

Thanks for reaching out! We can definitely handle your order for the precast footers (order number 234123). Lead time is looking like 5-6 days for production plus shipping. I'll get Tom in engineering to review the specs and get back to you by EOD.

Best,
Jennifer Martinez
Sales Rep - Titan Precast Solutions
order #234123 approved for production - tom R reviewed dwgs, all specs check out. assigning to production line B, supervisor: Marcus Johnson. materials already in stock so we're good to go. -Jennifer

Production log 01/03/2011: Started casting for order two-three-four-one-two-three. Marcus J supervising. Forms set up on line B. Concrete mix batch #CC-8834 approved by QC (Rodriguez). Weather conditions optimal. Est completion: 01/05/2011

QC INSPECTION REPORT
Date: Jan 4 2011
Inspector: Carlos Rodriguez  
Order: 234123
Items: 12x precast concrete footers
Status: 10 units PASS, 2 units MINOR SURFACE DEFECTS (cosmetic only, within tolerance)
Approved for shipment: YES
Notes: small air pockets on units #7 and #11, does not affect structural integrity per engineer Tom R.

Scheduling shipment for order 234-123 (Springfield project). Customer contact: Sarah Chen. Polaris Shipping assigned - driver Jim Patterson, truck #PS-447. Pickup from warehouse scheduled 01/06 morning. Delivery ETA 01/07 afternoon. -Logistics Dept

loaded 12 footers onto truck ps447 this morning around 7am. order 234123. all units secured with straps and padding. bill of lading signed by marcus. driver jim heading out now. - warehouse guy (pete)

DELAY NOTICE - Truck PS-447 (driver: Jim Patterson)
Route: Titan Precast -> Springfield Construction Site
Cargo: Order #234123 (12x concrete footers)
Issue: Major accident on I-95 southbound, complete closure. Rerouting via State Route 42 will add 8-10 hours to delivery. New ETA: Thursday 01/08 instead of Friday 01/07.
Customer notification: REQUIRED
- Polaris Dispatch

Hey mike, this is jim with polaris shipping. I'm calling to let you know your ughhh order 234123 has been delayed until thursday. Again, that's ughh 234123 order. Okay give me a call back when you're available, bye.

Voicemail transcript: "Hi Jim, this is Sarah Chen, not Mike - I think you have the wrong contact? Anyway, I got the message about order 234123 being delayed. Thursday works but we really need it by 2pm because the crane is scheduled for 3pm. Can you confirm timing? Call me back at 555-0142. Thanks."

DELIVERY CONFIRMATION
Truck: PS-447 | Driver: Jim Patterson  
Order #: 234123
Delivered to: Springfield Mega Mall Construction Site, Loading Zone C
Received by: Mike Torres (Site Foreman)
Timestamp: 01/08/2011 13:35
Condition: All 12 units inspected on-site, minor cosmetic defects noted on 2 units (previously documented), accepted by foreman
Signature: M. Torres
Notes: "Crane operator Danny already on site, starting install immediately"

Install Report - Phase 2 Foundation
Date: 1/8/11
Crane Operator: Danny Wu
Footers from order 234123 installed in grid positions A1-A12 per engineering drawings. Installation supervised by Mike Torres (foreman). All units level and aligned within specs. Concrete pour for grade beams scheduled for next week.
- Danny W.

SITE INSPECTION LOG
Project: Springfield Mega Mall  
Inspector: Building Dept - Linda Kowalski
Date: 01/10/2011
Footers (from order two three four one two three) installed and cured properly. Grade elevation verified. Installation meets code requirements. Foundation work approved to proceed to next phase.
Status: âœ“ APPROVED

Invoice #INV-234123-FINAL from Titan Precast Solutions
Billed to: Springfield Development Corp
Attn: Frank (Accounting)
Order: 234123 - 12x Precast Concrete Footers F-2400x800x600mm
Amount: $18,450.00
Shipping (Polaris): $1,200.00
Rush fee: $500.00
Total: $20,150.00
Payment terms: Net 30
Delivered: 01/08/2011
Installed: 01/08/2011
Approved by: Sarah Chen (Project Manager)
